summary: Rafael, a Sevillian who has never left Andalucia, decides to leave his homeland to follow Amaia, a Basque girl unlike other women whom he has ever known.
cast: Clara Lago|Dani Rovira|Carmen Machi|Karra Elejalde|Alberto López|Alfonso Sánchez|Aitor Mazo|Abel Mora|Aitziber Garmendia|Miriam Cabeza|Iñaki Beraetxe|Egoitz Lasa|Lander Otaola|Mikel Roman|Santi Ugalde|Telmo Esnal|Itziar Atienza|Antonio Romero|Rafael Ruiz
director: Director: Emilio Martínez Lázaro (as Emilio Martínez-Lázaro)
title: Ocho apellidos vascos
